item.description:
A fun, yet honest look at how Orwell’s concept of Doublespeak (1984) has evolved over the years into areas that I call “Triplespeak” Neither of which can happen without the assistance of the “intellectual Elite” who have bastardized the English Language and attempt to dumb down America.  Please bring some Doublespeak examples to the discussion.

Presented by: Brent.

Remember: Even though we post an end time for our meetups, several of us almost always hang around to chat and shoot the breeze after the official event is, um, "over". ALL are welcome to stay for the fun and camaraderie!

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: Double Speak, Triple Speak & the Bastardization of the American English Language
